EmailTemplate.name: Newsletter July, 2013
EmailTemplate.subject: Newsletter July, 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
If you want to have a fun and interesting read whilst on the beach, the mountain, next to a swimming pool or at the country side, please click on the link below for the latest ISM Newsletter.
http://www.internationalschool.ru/en/school-life/newsletters.aspx
Hope you are all enjoying the summer break!
Regards,
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
